name: staticmaps
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool maptoolkit.
Tool description: A toolkit for maps: Map tiles, address search (geocoding), routing, static maps & elevation
API description: Generates a static map image URL based on the given parameters.

size.description: Size of the map. Format is usually `{width}x{height}`.

center.description: Center coordinates of the map. Format is `{latitude},{longitude}`.

bounds.description: Bounding box to define the map area instead of `center` and `zoom`. Format is `{north},{east},{south},{west}`.

geojson.description:
Value: 
`{attribute}:{value}[|{attribute}:{value} ...]`
Attributes:
`geometry` is a GeoJSON string of type `LineString` or `MultiLineString`
`color` in hex color format `{AABBGGRR}`
`width` sets the lines thickness

Repeated `geojson` parameters supported.

maptype.description: Type of the map, defining its appearance. Default is 'toursprung-terrain'.

path.description:
Value: 
`{attribute}:{value}[|{attribute}:{value} ...]`
Attributes:
`points` are the paths coordinates `{lat},{lng}[|{lat}:{lng} ...]`
`color` in hex color format `{AABBGGRR}`
`width` sets the lines thickness

Repeated `path` parameters supported.

delta_zoom.description: Defines how many zoom levels will get added/removed if it the `zoom` was calculated automatically.

kml.description:
Value: 
`{kml}?{attribute}={value}[&{attribute}={value} ...]`
Attributes:
`color` in hex color format `{AABBGGRR}`
`width` sets the lines thickness

Repeated `kml` parameters supported.

format.description: File format of the map image. Default is 'png'.

marker.description:
Value: 
`{attribute}:{value}[|{attribute}:{value} ...]`
Attributes:
`center` is the markers location
`icon` can be any public URL of a PNG or JPEG
`shadow` can be set to `false` to change the markers anchor from center to bottom

Repeated `marker` parameters supported.
